chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (F m z) -> F_1 m (F m z) = z

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
F = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => A_1 m one (A_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
F_1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => A m zero (A m one z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
dart = nat : Set
succf_exd_F : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succf m z -> exd m (F m z)
not_exd_F_1_nil : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> F_1 m z = nil
F_F_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (F_1 m z) -> F m (F_1 m z) = z
MA1.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> McA1.f m (McA1.f_1 m z) = z
MA0.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> McA0.f m (McA0.f_1 m z) = z
MA0.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> McA0.f_1 m (McA0.f m z) = z
MA1.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> McA1.f_1 m (McA1.f m z) = z
McA0.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m Md0.k (cA_1 m Md0.k z) = z
McA1.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m Md1.k (cA m Md1.k z) = z
McA1.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m Md1.k (cA_1 m Md1.k z) = z
McA0.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m Md0.k (cA m Md0.k z) = z
MA1.degree_per : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA1.f m) (MA1.degree m z) z = z
MA0.degree_per : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (MA0.f m) (MA0.degree m z) z = z
predf_F_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> predf m z < -> F_1 m z <> nil
predf_exd_F_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> predf m z -> exd m (F_1 m z)
bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = z
top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = z
cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (cA_1 m k z) = z
cA_1_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (cA m k z) = z
bottom_top_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
top_bottom_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z
exd_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (cA m k z) /\ exd m (cA_1 m k z)
exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (top m k z)
exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (bottom m k z)
A_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> A m k (A_1 m k z) = z
A_1_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> A_1 m k (A m k z) = z
cA_1_eq_aux : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k z = (if pred_dec m k z then A_1 m k z else top m k z)
pred_exd_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m (A_1 m k z)
succ_exd_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m (A m k z)
not_exd_F_nil : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> F m z = nil
nosucc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k z = z
nopred_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k z = z
cA_1_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA_1 m k z = top m k z
MA1.exd_diff_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA1.diff_orb m z
MA0.exd_diff_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA0.diff_orb m z
fixpt_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA m k z = z /\ cA_1 m k z = z
not_exd_A_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> A m k z = nil
not_exd_A_1_nil : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> A_1 m k z = nil
MA1.degree_bound : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> (MA1.degree m z <= ndN m)%nat
MA0.degree_bound : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> (MA0.degree m z <= ndN m)%nat

```  
intros m z H1 H2 H3.
unfold F_1.
unfold F.  
simpl.
rewrite -> McA0.f_1_f, McA0.f_f_1, McA1.f_1_f, succf_exd_F; try assumption.
apply predf_exd_F_1; try assumption.  
```

original: intros m z H1 H2 H3. unfold F_1. unfold F. simpl. rewrite -> McA0.f_1_f, McA0.f_f_1, McA1.f_1_f, succf_exd_F; try auto. apply predf_exd_F_1; try auto.
